column4: Hey. I installed Ubuntu using VMWare.....How come my external hard drive isn't showing up in Ubuntu? How do I get it to? Usually it just shows up on the desktop as a mounted drive, correct?
as far as I know you have to tell vmware to connect the device
Any idea on how to do that? :)
when your Ubuntu vm is loaded, go to the VM menu and removable devices, then select your USB drive and select it. That should do it
